text: She began dating art dealer Vito Schnabel, 31, last month. And after multiple sightings of the pair, Amber Heard confirmed her relationship on Tuesday at the Wimbledon Tennis Championships in London, when she shared her first public kiss with her beau in quite the PDA show. While the 32 - year - old and the ex - boyfriend of Heidi Klum appeared to be enjoying the sporting match, they spent much of their time preoccupied with each other's presence.
